What's New

Last updated: July 07, 2017

Jekyll Theme

July 07, 2017

The theme has been refactored by Guillermo Calvo as a Jekyll theme to be easily usable in GitHub Pages.

Activate this theme by adding a new line to your _config.yml file:

remote_theme: leakyabstractions/pretty-docs

Here is an example of a GitHub Pages site using this theme:

  • GitHub Pages Demo source code
